Replying to @philhawksworth 2019-02-27 09:30
@SaraSoueidan @duncanmacgregor @Netlify @deployhq ...@Netlify would not serve a site using MySQL. Instead, sites which depend on content in a CMS, use a decoupled model and pull the content in from a headless CMS at site build time. If data is required at request time, we'd typically use #serverless functions and a DBAAS.
